[TITLE]
<line: 27> Plaintiff.

[TEXT]
<line: 29> V.
<line: 30> AUSTIN INDUSTRIAL, INC.,
<line: 31> Defendant.

[TITLE]
<line: 33> ORDER APPROVING SETTLEMENT AND
<line: 34> FINAL JUDGMENT DISMISSING CLAIMS WITH PREJUDICE

[TEXT]
<line: 36> Came on this day for consideration the Parties' Joint Motion For Order Approving.
<line: 37> Settlement and Entry of Final Judgment Dismissing Lawsuit With Prejudice in connection with.
<line: 38> the above-referenced case (the "Joint Motion'). After due consideration, this Court is of the
<line: 39> opinion that the Joint Motion should be in all things GRANTED..

[TEXT]
<line: 41> The Court finds that the Settlement Agreement is an adequate, fair and reasonable.
<line: 42> resolution of a bona fide dispute over wages owed pursuant to the Fair Labor Standards Act (the
<line: 43> FLSA"), and accordingly, the Settlement Agreement is APPROVED.

[TEXT]
<line: 45> It is FURTHER ORDERED, ADJUDGED and DECREED that all claims asserted by
<line: 46> Plaintiffs against Defendant in this matter are hereby DISMISSED WITH PREJUDICE

[TEXT]
<line: 48> It is FURTHER ORDERED that the Court shall retain jurisdiction over the Parties to
<line: 49> enforce the Settlement Agreement..

[TEXT]
<line: 51> Jeremhu? ,2018
<line: 52> SIGNED and executed this

[ABANDON]
<line: 54> Jancy F. Atlas.
<line: 55> United States District Judge
